page.title: 09SPORTING FACILITIES.
page.content: Recreational facilities in a rural area are obviously very limited but a {Cricket Club}was formed in 1976 and now has its home ground at the Stocking's Field which belongs to the Church at Aston Ingham. A{Tennis Club was formed a few years later and now has one hard court laid on the same field and plans are in hand for a grass court. On a separate piece of land the work has started on laying a {Bowling Green}and it is hoped it will be ready for use in 1987. All these clubs draw their membership from a wide area which includes our block. There are a few houses with outdoor swimming pools. The owners are all very generous in allowing others the use of these pools,in particular the Scouts and Guides.
